description: An encapsulation of a product and a quantity ordered

itemID.description: The ID of the associated item. Note, either item or itemID is required.

item.description: The associated item. Note, either item or itemID is required.

earnLevelType.description: Specifies this discount is earned by truck dollar value

earnLevelAmount.description: The amount that must be spent to earn a discount

discountType.description: Specifies this is an Amount Off discount

amountOff.description: Amount taken off the price of a single item. Test: value should not exceed price of item.

discountID.description: A unique identifier used to differentiate between discount objects.

itemIDs.description: An array of itemIDs that describe which items this discount is associated with.

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discount.

discountDescription.description: The description of the discount which may be displayed to the user.

earnLevelType.description: Specifies this discount is earned by truck item quantity

earnLevelQuantity.description: The number of items that must be purchased to earn a discount

discountType.description: Specifies this is an Amount Off discount

amountOff.description: Amount taken off the price of a single item. Test: value should not exceed price of item.

discountID.description: A unique identifier used to differentiate between discount objects.

itemIDs.description: An array of itemIDs that describe which items this discount is associated with.

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discount.

discountDescription.description: The description of the discount which may be displayed to the user.

earnLevelType.description: Specifies this discount has no qualifications the user must meet in order to apply the discount

earnLevelType.description: Specifies this discount is earned by truck dollar value

earnLevelAmount.description: The amount that must be spent to earn a discount

discountType.description: Specifies this is a Credit Free discount

earnedItem.description: The item earned by a CF type discount

itemID.description: A unique identifier for differentiating item objects.

brandName.description: The name of the item's parent brand.

inventoryCount.description: The number of items currently in stock. Specify 0 for out of stock or unavailable items and -1 for unknown.

name.description: A name for the item displayable to the user.

popularityRating.description: An arbitrary float representing how popular this item is. Items with greater popularityRatings will sort to the top by default.

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discount.

discountDescription.description: The description of the discount which may be displayed to the user.

priceID.description: A unique identifier for differentiating price objects

suggestedRetailPrice.description: The price advised for the item.

unitPrice.description: The top-line price for the item.

startDate.description: The effective starting date of the price.

endDate.description: The date this price will expire.

package.description: A description of a beverage container. For instance, four six-packs of 12oz bottles.

packageID.description: A unique ID used to differentiate package objects

itemCount.description: The number of bottles/cans/kegs in a single container. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 6.

itemSize.description: The volume of a single keg, bottle, or can in a package.

returnable.description: Marks whether the package may be returned or not.

unitCount.description: The number of containers in a package. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 2.

caseEquivalency.description: The number of cases the package equates to.

adjustedCaseEquivalency.description: The value used to determine this packages contribution to achieving the order minimum. This property may be used to increase or reduce the effect of adding a given package to an order.

itemID.description: A unique identifier for differentiating item objects.

brandName.description: The name of the item's parent brand.

inventoryCount.description: The number of items currently in stock. Specify 0 for out of stock or unavailable items and -1 for unknown.

name.description: A name for the item displayable to the user.

popularityRating.description: An arbitrary float representing how popular this item is. Items with greater popularityRatings will sort to the top by default.

orderItemID.description: A unique identifier to differentiate orderItem objects

pricingCondition.description: The condition by which this object was priced.

orderability.description: If the item is able to be ordered, value should be ORDERABLE. Otherwise, value should be a displayable reason why the item cannot be ordered.
